track_name: Dusk Till Dawn (feat. Sia) - Radio Edit

data.prompt: A moonlit landscape stretches endlessly, adorned with silvery shadows where a pair of lovers hold hands under a sky sprawling with twinkling stars, embodying a bittersweet longing. The soft glow of twilight casts an enchanting hue, evoking feelings of wistfulness and deep connection.

An ethereal painting of a dusky horizon where the sun just kisses the edges of the earth, blending muted purples, deep blues, and hints of gold lingers in the air, suggesting a transition between hope and melancholy. Delicate brush strokes hint at two silhouetted figures, conveying an emotional bond amidst the stunning yet somber backdrop.

In a misty, dreamlike forest at twilight, phantom figures wander among dappled light, their expressions hidden yet filled with emotion, capturing the sense of introspection and nostalgia. Soft, diffused glows and muted earth tones envelop the scene, creating a hauntingly beautiful atmosphere that resonates with deep, unspoken sentiments.
